author: Press Release Distribution Service
title: Breakthrough for Dog Joint Health: The SynoComplex Formula | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
The SynoComplex Formula, developed by leading pet supplement provider Vetrinex, is engineered to enhance senior dog joint health. With Glucosamine, Chondroitin, and MSM in its Advanced Joint Support, it promises improved mobility for aging dogs, marking a breakthrough in pet wellness.
Las Vegas, NV, Nevada, United States - December 29, 2023 —
Vetrinex, a venture specializing in pet supplements, has worked on its proprietary SynoComplex Formula, a major step forward in dog joint health. This innovative formula, carefully engineered by Vetrinex, targets joint problems in senior dogs - helping them reverse the effects of aging and lead active, pain-free lives.
Joint problems are a common concern among pet parents, especially as dogs age.
Senior dogs suffer from joint stiffness, inflammation, and slow recovery from injuries, which renders them unable to perform everyday activities like walking, climbing up and down the stairs, or actions as little as jumping on the couch.
Vetrinex Advanced Joint Support, equipped with the SynoComplex Formula, stands as a ray of hope for these furry companions.
The SynoComplex Formula comprises three key ingredients:
Glucosamine (HCl) Chondroitin Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM)
The ingredients are carefully researched and engineered to be present in a 2:1:1 ratio in the supplement.
Glucosamine fortifies joint structure, Chondroitin acts as a catalyst in cartilage production aiding quick recovery from various injuries, and MSM, with its anti-inflammatory properties, targets and alleviates pain effectively.
"Senior dogs deserve a good quality of life too" says Vatsan, Founder of the pioneering venture, Vetrinex Labs. "Our SynoComplex Formula is the culmination of extensive research and dedication to dog well-being."
The SynoComplex Formula not only brings back the agility found in younger dogs, but also aids in recovery and prevention of degenerative joint troubles, ensuring a happier, more mobile life for dogs. Through the formula, Vetrinex offers a boost in efficiency, setting a new standard in effective dosing for joint care supplements.
The Advanced Joint Support contains 120 chewable tablets per bottle retailing for $48.72. They are also available in multi-unit packs of 2 units for $87.6 and 3 units for $124.25.
Get the Advanced Joint Support bottle here:
store.vetrinexlabs.com/adv-joint-support
Visit their store here.
https://vetrinexlabs.com/
About Us: Vetrinex Labs is a pioneering pet wellness company dedicated to the development of high-quality pet healthcare solutions that pets love, are effective and are easy to use. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, Vetrinex Labs has earned a reputation for creating transformative solutions that address the unique needs of every pet in every walk of life. Their breakthroughs aren’t limited to just joint health as they have made remarkable progress in the areas of skin & coat health, gut and digestion and overall pet wellness.
